rooms.description: A wide entrance hall with a small seating area and storage space; located in the north-east to adhere to Vastu guidelines.
Spacious living room facing south for maximum sunlight, integrated with the central courtyard view; includes modern furniture layout.
Dining area adjacent to the living room in the east direction, ensuring auspicious energy flows.
Well-equipped kitchen located on the west side with efficient workflow; includes ventilation and ample storage.
Bathroom near the kitchen area for convenience, designed with Vastu-compliant drainage to avoid water pooling.

openings.description: Main entrance door ensuring a strong ingress of positive energy.
Windows designed to allow natural light and proper ventilation, placed according to Vastu guidelines.
